p: The studies involving human participants were reviewed and approved by the Ethics Committee on Human Research of Evandro 117 Chagas Institute, Brazilian Ministry of Health (protocol No. 0039/2011 and protocol No. 118 0017/2014 update No. 1.318.103 of 2015). Written informed consent to participate in this study was provided by the participantsâ€™ legal guardian/next of kin.
